attributes.review: app took forever to load. then when it did load i saw chickens. chickens covered my entire screen and i couldn’t do anything. really you decide to put pictures of chickens covering the entire screen?? wow real professional. then somehow my phone glitched out and shocked me. i almost had a heart attack. therefore this app is HORRIBLE.
attributes.title: worst app ever.

attributes.review: This has got to be the worst app in history I wouldn’t recommend this to any one weird things started happening to my phone after I used the app . My phone started lagging they asked for to much personal info and many other sensitive things beware before you download
attributes.title: Ridiculous app

attributes.review: The structure of this app is terrible. My family liked trump until we downloaded this app and saw how childish it looked. (really matches his personality!) We immediately burned all our trump 2020 merchandise and no longer wish the best for him. We now say, “trump 2020, but on a gravestone.” This app ruined him for us, take it down.
attributes.title: This needs to be taken down

attributes.review: DO NOT get this app it took forever to download and when i got it gave my phone a virus. Every time i would open app it would shut off my phone and delete my contacts and photos. 0/10 do not recommend i can’t go on the app without my phone overheating and a really ugly orange fat guy showing up on my screen.
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THE APP 😡😡🤬🤬

attributes.review: I am disgusted this has vile content it killed my family, I am now blinded and deaf just like helen keller and magically writing this. This app is horrible and needs to be taken down immediately. I sent my address and they send people over to my home to kill my family, I hate this app it is utterly disgusting and mortifying, needs to be taken down ASAP!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app took 3 weeks to download and when i finally got it to work, i got a notification that they won’t let me make an account because i’m black!!!! I WAS OUTRAGED. THEN, my screen was flooded with the app CALLING ME THE N WORD. They even said that I reminded them of a monkey. I am heartbroken💔💔 i used to love that orange man😢 but not anymore😕.  i will not be voting trump 2020 and it’s because of this app.
attributes.title: RACIST APP

attributes.review: Took forever to download and wouldn’t let me do anything on my phone while it did. My neighbor was having a heart attack and asked me to call 911 but I said I can’t because the app is still downloading so I had to wait til the following morning to call 911 and by then he was ice cold, turning purple and refused to get up 🤷🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: This app killed my neighbor!

attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever gotten, I hit download and it immediately killed both of my dogs and my brother as well. I went into it once to see why people hate it so much, and I completely understand! It showed obscene and inappropriate images and I’m pretty sure it’s just an app for drug trafficking! Take it down!
attributes.title: Horrible app!!!

attributes.review: This app is running my life one day I decided to download this app and my dog died after this😢😔😿also I have cancer now and I don’t feel good and I only have one day to live😔I am very mad at this app it is not working it made my life terrible thank u 🍊 for making me suffer guy if u see this pls don’t download this app it’s so sad 😿
attributes.title: This made my life horrible 😿

attributes.review: This 🍊 man bad. His app is horrible it took forever to download and I’m having issues on how to navigate it!😡😡😡this  app is poorly designed and made! I don’t know who made it but it need to be designed again. My cat thought this app was confusing too! He didn’t understand it at all! Not cat friendly!!!!
attributes.title: This app is horrible
